docs.text: awesome-point-cloud-analysis for anyone who wants to do research about 3D point cloud. [Ford Campus Vision and Lidar Data Set] The dataset is collected by an autonomous ground vehicle testbed, based upon a modified Ford F-250 pickup truck.
